data.title: Famous Authors from China
data.meta_description: List of the most popular authors from China, listed alphabetically with photos when available. For centuries authors have been among the world's most ...
data.text:
List of the most popular authors from China, listed alphabetically with photos when available. For centuries authors have been among the world's most important people, helping chronicle history and keep us entertained with one of the earliest forms of storytelling. Whether they're known for fiction, non-fiction, poetry or even technical writing, the famous Chinese authors on this list have kept that tradition alive by writing renowned works that have been praised around the world. You can find useful information below about these notable Chinese writers, such as when they were born and where their place of birth was.

Authors here include everything from Chen-Ning Yang to Lu Xun.

This list answers the questions, "Which famous authors are from China?" and "Who are the best Chinese authors?"

For further information on these historic Chinese authors, click on their names. If you're a bookworm then use this list of celebrated Chinese authors to discover some new books that you will enjoy reading.
